page.title: 08Clock and Watch-mending.
page.content: When he had to give up the building trade after an illness in{1944,Mr.Ern- {est Davies,Brook House,Stoney Stretton needed a job that he could do at home so he taught himself to mend clocks and watches.At first he worked for jewellers in Shrewsbury,but he built up a business at home and had customers from as far as Wellington. He has mended all kinds of clocks and watches,but since 1980 he has just done it as a hobby because the parts are so expensive and hard to get and more people have battery clocks and watches and ones made of plastic. He has shelves full of pots and watches so he's still busy all day. It's a very fiddly hobby,but he likes it better than television.
